# Quality Control Before Processing

This directory contains NanoPlot output for raw reads quality assessment.

## Expected Output Files

- `NanoPlot-report.html` - Interactive HTML report
- `NanoStats.txt` - Summary statistics
- `*.png` - Various QC plots

## Generated By

```bash
conda activate 03a_long_read_nanoplot
NanoPlot --fastq 01_raw_reads/long_reads/reads.fastq.gz \
    -o 02_reads_QC_before_processing/long_reads/ \
    --threads 12
```
